Here is an archive of the news from the <nowiki>[[WelshTeam|Ubuntu Cymru LoCo Team]]</nowiki>

==== 2010 ====

==== 23rd Sept 2009 ====
* Global Jam will be held in Cardiff Central Library. More info here: <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WelshTeam/GlobalJam2009]]</nowiki>.

==== 24th May 2009 ====
* Started logo competition for Ubuntu Cymru. <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1168870]]</nowiki>

* Venue(s) decided for the Jaunty Release Party.

* New Ubuntu Forums group: <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/group.php?groupid=502 | Ubuntu Cymru]]</nowiki>

* Planning <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/WelshTeam/JauntyReleaseParty|Jaunty release party]]</nowiki>.

* New wiki up
* <nowiki>[[http://www.chrisswift.eu|New website up]]</nowiki> '''Note:''' Hosting and Domain is temporary.
